channel.title: PNPC server / 508 not working
channel.description:
So yes. I wanna try PNPC either on a a server that is already up or on moparscape but my problem is that the 508 doesn't work. It always just a white screen with the error in the corner that says "org.moparscape.applet" What can I do? :( all I want is to use PNPC on a 508+ graphics on moparscape or a server that is up and available. :c
thanks for any help and sorry if this is the wrong forum, had no clue where to ask

item.title: PNPC server / 508 not working
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Rad02, post:3, topic:553170”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=672085.msg4494926#msg4494926 date=1441246931]
If you just want to use pnpc commands, try downloading a 508 server and client from the download section. 508s are rare enough, especially finding one that allows you to use the pnpc command.
[/quote]

thanks! I tried downloading a client, but when i press run/compile it says “system could not find the path specified” and when I try 508 moparscape webclient it always shows this error: “org.moparscape.applet” [/quote]

Try changing the run/compile batch files from “C:…\java.exe” to java, then use Lin’s EV setter if your environment variables aren’t set.

Read full topic
